# datapower_quotaenforcementserver (Resource)

Quota Enforcement Server (`default` domain only)
  - CLI Alias: `quota-enforcement-server`

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "datapower_quotaenforcementserver" "test" {
  server_port  = 16379
  monitor_port = 26379
}
```
